name: Wildlife Park 2 - Crazy Zoo
description: The Zoo is expanding! More than 30 new types of animals and plants have moved in at the zoo. Favorite species such as the Wolf, the Arctic Fox, the Giant Kangaroo and the Meerkat are the new Stars in your zoo! Improve the park with the blossoms of sunflowers and rare orchids and plant exotic trees such as bamboo and eucalyptus.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8/7 Processor: Intel Pentium IV 2 GHz or compatible Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9c compatible, 64 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3000 MB available space Additional Notes: ATTENTION: Does not work with any Wildlife Park Retail Versions

reviews.review_text: I like this game it's much better than zoo tycoon (my opinion)
I mean... The game quality is crap (but I didn't expect a high quality), the controls are wonky and the missions are impossible fr. Idk Zoo Tycoon is hella better
